content:
That's wonderful to hear! I'm sure Max is thrilled to have a clean, comfy spot to call his own. There's nothing better than seeing our furry friends happy and relaxed in their new beds!

I'm sure the bed is getting plenty of use, especially if Max has allergies and needs a clean and comfortable place to rest. You're doing a great job taking care of him, and I'm sure he appreciates all the love and attention.

Does Max have a favorite way to sleep in his new bed? Does he like to curl up in a ball, stretch out, or snuggle up in a particular position?
